Data Annotation Platform for Siamese Nets¶

Quesadiya is an open source project that provides a data annotation project management platform for training Siamese Neural Networks by SiameseLab.

With Quesadiya, you can:
  • manage a data annotation project through Command Line Interface.
  • annotate data through Web GUI.

Get started by following this Quick Start.
